name: Simpsons Trivia
description:
The Simpsons Trivia Quiz now game ported to the Sega MegaDrive / Genesis. 
Original game built for the Sega Master System and available on SMS Power!
Built for the Sega MegaDrive using the Sega Genesis Development Kit [SGDK].  Available for FREE but suggested donation $1.00 either directly or via  Pay Pal. 
Alternatively, feel free to buy me a coffee @ ko-fi.com/SteveProXNA.  Thanks!
